name: Classic Hot Dog
description: All-beef frank on a toasted brioche bun with yellow mustard, ketchup, and relish.

name: Chicago Dog
description: All-beef frank with yellow mustard, neon relish, sport peppers, tomato, onion, celery salt, and a pickle spear. No ketchup. Ever.

name: Chili Cheese Dog
description: All-beef frank topped with house chili and shredded sharp cheddar on a steamed bun.

name: Veggie Dog
description: Plant-based frank on a toasted bun with all the fixings.

name: Classic Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine, house-made Caesar dressing, shaved Parmesan, and garlic croutons.

name: Caesar Salad â€” No Croutons
description: Classic Caesar without the croutons. Gluten-free friendly.

name: Caesar Salad with Grilled Salmon
description: Classic Caesar topped with a pan-seared Atlantic salmon fillet.

name: Miso Glazed Grilled Salmon
description: Atlantic salmon fillet with white miso, mirin, and sesame glaze, grilled over charcoal. Served with steamed jasmine rice and pickled cucumbers.

name: Salmon Club Sandwich
description: Flaked grilled salmon, avocado, tomato, butter lettuce, and lemon aioli on toasted sourdough.

name: French Fries
description: Hand-cut russet potatoes, fried twice, served with house sauce.

name: Parmesan Fries
description: French fries tossed with shaved Parmesan, fresh parsley, and garlic butter.

name: Chili Cheese Fries
description: French fries loaded with house chili and sharp cheddar.

name: Onion Rings
description: Beer-battered thick-cut onion rings with chipotle ranch.

name: Club Sandwich
description: Triple-decker with turkey, bacon, Swiss, tomato, lettuce, and mayo on toasted white.

name: Grilled Cheese
description: Three-cheese blend on sourdough with a cup of tomato bisque.

name: Lemonade
description: Fresh-squeezed house lemonade.

name: Iced Tea
description: Unsweetened black iced tea with lemon.

name: Arnold Palmer
description: Half iced tea, half lemonade.

name: Sparkling Water
description: San Pellegrino, 500ml.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
description: Warm, fresh-baked chocolate chip cookie.

name: Brownie

description: Ask your server for today's flavors.
